text: “Tagi aamua hai mee dabu le e aamua i digau hai mee dabu ala i golo, mee gu hagatulu gi nia lolo haga madagu gi hongo dono libogo gu haga dabu belee ulu ono gahu hai mee dabu. Mee hagalee dugu nia ngaahulu dono libogo haga meheuheu, be e hahaahi ono gahu bolo e hagamodongoohia ai dono manawa gee.
